SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AboutPane
This class represents the About Pane of MyChessmate.
Evaluator
Evaluator is a class that evaluates the score of a given chess position based on the values and locations of each piece.
Game
A Game represents a chess game.
GameData
 
Move
A class that represents a move in a game.
MoveGenerator
This class generates and stores all possible moves that can be made by each piece of a particular player.
MoveSearcher
 
MyChessmate
The MyChessmate class represents the main class of the chess game.
Piece
This class represents a chess piece, with a specific value, location and movement state.
Position
The Position class represents the state of the chess board and holds information about the game including the board, last move made, and pieces owned by the player and the computer.
PreferencesPane
A class representing a JFrame window for setting game preferences such as level and color.
PromotionPane
Dialog box to allow user to select a promotion piece when a pawn reaches the opposite end of the board.
Resource
Resource class that loads properties file for MyChessmate game
